text: Vice Admiral Sir James George Jungius KBE DL (15 November 1923 - 14 October 2020) was a Royal Navy officer. He became Deputy Supreme Allied Commander Atlantic in 1975. Jungius was promoted to rear admiral on 7 July 1972 and appointed Assistant Chief of the Naval Staff (Operational Requirements) the same year. He died on 14 October 2020 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British military people
title: James Jungius
